description: Enable advanced LinkedIn profile search, extraction, and contact information enrichment through a powerful MCP server. Leverage AI-powered query expansion, smart filtering, and multiple data sources to obtain comprehensive and validated professional profiles. Export and manage data efficiently with built-in CSV support and persistent storage.
